These Pictures Of Priyanka Chopra Will Make Fans Go Weak In Their Knees
These Pictures Of Priyanka Chopra Will Make Fans Go Weak In Their Knees
Priyanka Chopra has made her presence felt in both Bollywood and Hollywood alike. She got married to American singer Nick Jonas last year in December. Priyanka was crowned the Femina Miss India-World title in 2000. Born to a family of doctors, Priyanka Chopra has done some great films to stamp her authority in Indian cinema. She made her Bollywood debut with the film Andaz starring Akshay Kumar. She claimed fame with her brilliant acting in the 2004 thriller Aitraaz. She also has a National Award to hername for her splendid performance in Fashion (2008) where she played a troubled model with ease. She has done several critically acclaimed films like Kaminey (2009), 7 Khoon Maaf (2011), Barfi! (2012), Mary Kom (2014), and Bajirao Mastani (2015) and featured in the commercially successful sequels Don 2 (2011) and Krrish 3 (2013).
During 2015 and 2018, she was also a part of an English thriller TV series Quantico. With this series, she became the first South Asian to headline an American TV sereis. She has also has brief roles in Hollywood movies like Baywatch (2017) and A Kid Like Jake (2018).

title: These Pictures Of Priyanka Chopra Will Make Fans Go Weak In Their Knees
description: Priyanka Chopra won the Femina Miss India-World title(2000) and later established herself as an actress in Bollywood. She was born in Jamshedpur, Jharkhand on July 18, 1982. Her late father Ashok Chopra and mother Madhu Chopra are doctors. She married Nick Jonas, an American actor and musician, in December 2018. Priyanka Chopra’s made her Bollywood debut with the film Andaaz.
